modName: More Morrowind Like Glass Armor Texture
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: I have now released newer version that comes with both armor and weapons, I\'m going to make uptades to that file and let this be. I\'m not going to delete this file if someone likes this better. If you like this file you may want to see the newer. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15300]LINK to the NEWER file[/url]

THIS MOD REPLACES EVERY GLASS ARMOR TEXTURE WITH NEW.

This is my second glass retexture mod. This time I made only armor textures. But I can make weapons too if someone wants them or you can download weapon retextures from my \"Much Brighter Glass Weapons and Armor\" mod by picking just \"Brighter Glass Weapons\" from Optional files.

The idea of this mod is retexture glass armor to look more Morrowind like. 

NOTE: The More Morrowind Like Glass Weapons Texture is out now, look below for link.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installing
Drag and drop \"textures\" folder to \"skyrim\\data\"


Uninstalling
Delete \"glass\" folder from \"skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5311]More Morrowind Like Glass Weapons Texture[/url]


[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4698]Link to Much Brighter Glass Weapons and Armor[/url]
author: JESSETIN3
